org.ftccommunity.org.ftccommunity.ftcxtensible.networking

Class ServerSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ftccommunity.org.ftccommunity.ftcxtensible.networking.ServerSettings

  • public class ServerSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Server Settings manager, this handles the control of the HTTP web server, and maintains all of the critical information reguarding the server
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    David Sargent

    • Method Summary

      • getHardwareMapJsonPage

        public java.lang.String getHardwareMapJsonPage()
        Gets the name of the JSON page representing the Hardware Map
        Returns:

        See Also:
        ExtensibleHardwareMap

      • setHardwareMapJsonPage

        public void setHardwareMapJsonPage(java.lang.String hardwareMapJsonPage)
        Sets the name of the JSON Hardware Map page. This val will not read any file from storage, but instead provide a Hardware at this name
        Parameters:
        hardwareMapJsonPage - name of the hardware map
